more.about:
For more than a 130 years, Jockey has led the apparel industry by producing garments that connect with our spirit of adventure. Our legacy, based on ingenuity, vitality and authenticity, celebrates progressive and independent thinking.
As a world-class brand, Jockey continues to inspire a renewed sense of individuality and freedom in modern men and women across the world.
Our mission for the Jockey® Brand is to establish and maintain a strong, consistent and unique global brand positioning.
Jockey is the only True, Authentic and Original International underwear brand. “There’s only one Jockey.”
We first establish our rich heritage, but always bring it forward to our modern, relevant positioning for today’s consumer.
